title: On Imagination - imagery likens imagination to

content.question: The imagery in lines 37-40 (“Before...dart”) most clearly likens Imagination to

choices.label: a soldier enduring a long war
a monarch sending an army into battle
the winner of a hotly contested race
the physician of a gravely ill patient

content.answer: a monarch sending an army into battle

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
